about_the_game:
CHAT WITH US ON DISCORD







Before this object can function again, there’s a lot of work to be done. With a set of various tools and your friend Amelia helping you out, you might be able to make it. Airport Renovator Prologue is an excellent introduction to the simulator game, where you start small and finish with a giant.


Get to work
Your toolset includes an axe, an air-blower, a grass trimmer, a power washer, and more! With the dynamic in-game environment, you’ll always have your hands full. There’s nothing more satisfying than blowing sand off the airfield before a plane touches down.



Airdrops

Friendly pilot Amelia will be dropping loot crates for you once in a while. Smash them with your axe, and don’t hesitate to use whatever you find inside. It can be anything from tools, airport equipment items to surprises that you surely won’t expect.



Plan and equip

You’re starting with a small airport and, if you run things well, you will finish with a massive, international one! Plan out where you’re going to place the airport items you’ve received and see the business thrive.



Fight against the forces of nature
This place has been abandoned for years, and nature has taken over. It’s up to you to fight against the overgrown vegetation in constantly changing weather conditions.





Visit us on Discord ->
detailed_description:
WE RECOMMEND YOU TO CHECK THESE GAMES...



About the Game

CHAT WITH US ON DISCORD







Before this object can function again, there’s a lot of work to be done. With a set of various tools and your friend Amelia helping you out, you might be able to make it. Airport Renovator Prologue is an excellent introduction to the simulator game, where you start small and finish with a giant.

movies.name: Airport Renovator - STEAM NEXT FEST TRAILER

name: Airport Renovator: Prologue

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: intel Core i3 3,20GHz / AMD Phenom II X4 955 3,2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 / AMD R7-260X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: The airport is devastated. It’s up to you to bring it back to the state of usability and beyond! Grab your tools cause the forces of nature have taken over this place. Collect air-dropped loot crates, complete diverse missions, and equip this airport with everything it needs. Go international!
supported_languages: English, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Czech, Spanish - Latin America, Polish, Russian, Turkish, Ukrainian, Hungarian
